thread.title: Nice spot in good neighborhood
thread.title_full: Nice spot in good neighborhood - Review of Citadines South Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Mike S
title: Nice spot in good neighborhood
text: Excellent location, close to Tube station in nice nieghborhood, 10 minute walk to Hyde Park. Kitchenette is small but useful. Every employee we encountered was very friendly and helpful. Free smart phone provided with free international calling. I would highly recommend this hotel.
